input.error-update: It was not possible to update the data. Error code:

user.login-error: Authentication failed, please try again later
user.logout-error: Could not log out, try again later

error.title: Authentication Error - Exoplanets
error.sub-message: Oops! An error occurred. Please try again or report the error. Visit our repository or send us an email.

success.title: Authentication Completed - Exoplanets
success.sub-message: Thank you for joining Exoplanets. For questions, suggestions or bug reports please visit our repository or send us an email.

constellations.howto: How do I create a constellation?

about.introduction: Exoplanets is a project that seeks to show in an easy and didactic way part of the universe. In this way, basic education students can boost their spatial learning through its use.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: We are Systems Engineering students from the National University of San Agust√≠n.

develop.title: Development
develop.content: The application was developed with different technologies. The source code and versions are hosted on GitHub.

credits.title: Credits
credits.content: We thank the people who created the materials used in the project.

profile.help: Having problems? Send us an email

exoplanets.title: Select an exoplanet and start exploring

create-const.empty-name: The field must not be empty
